page.title: 05WORLD PLOUGHING AT BAUMBER
page.content: On the 18th_21st of September 1984 the world ploughing match came to Baumber and Wispington.The fields belonged to R Craven and K.A Holt there was world ploughing,speed ploughing,horse ploughing,demonstrations of tractors, advertising stalls and craft stalls. the world ploughing included teams from Kenya,Britain,Spain,Austria, Ireland,France,Denmark,Sweden,Norway, Czechoslovakia,Finland,Switzerland, Germany,Yugoslavia,Italy,Hungary,Belgi um,Portugal,Australia and the U.S.A. The first place went to Austria Finland was second Belgium third and Britain was fourth.The horse ploughing was also a big event.It was won by Irelands competitor who had a black horse. The speed ploughing was won by Fiat against Ford. Unfortunately the weather was appalling there had been alot of rain which made progress hard.
